amds.features.title: Features
amds.features.angular-cli: A command line interface for Angular
amds.features.ngrx: One way data flow powered by RxJS Observables
amds.features.rxjs: Reactive programming with async collections using Observables
amds.features.bootstrap: Responsive layout from battle tested, world most famous UI library
amds.features.typescript: Superior developer experience, code completion, refactoring and less bugs
amds.features.fontawesome: Easy to use vector icons and social logos
amds.features.themes: Flexible theming support for provided and custom components
